articles.title: Rains help Argentine corn sowing as farmers grumble about export policy
articles.description: By Hugh BronsteinBUENOS AIRES, Oct 14 (Reuters) - Rains in central Argentina have helped farmers plant 2021/22 corn with 23.2% of expected area sown so far, the Buenos Aires Grains Exchange said on Thursday, while growers wrestle with a new export policy that they say could force them to plant less.The key corn-growing provinces of San Luis and Cordoba are enjoying good ground
articles.content:
By Hugh Bronstein
BUENOS AIRES, Oct 14 (Reuters) - Rains in central Argentina have helped farmers plant 2021/22 corn with 23.2% of expected area sown so far, the Buenos Aires Grains Exchange said on Thursday, while growers wrestle with a new export p... [2001 chars]

articles.title: Adamant Romero refutes Man Utd claim; lifts lid on Solskjaer banishment
articles.description: Former Manchester United goalkeeper Sergio Romero described his final year at Old Trafford as "strange", but refuted a claim he was banished back to Argentina after a January exit fell through.
articles.content:

articles.title: Argentina inflation spikes sharply despite battle to curb prices
articles.description: Argentina's inflation rate spiked back up to a higher-than-expected 3.5% in September after months of declines, heaping pressure on the Peronist government as it looks to keep prices down ahead of key midterm elections in November.
articles.content:

articles.description: Miner Barrick Gold Corp , on Thursday reported a nearly 5% rise in third-quarter gold production from the previous three months, helped by improved performance at its Veladero mine in Argentina.

articles.title: Latin Artist on the Rise: Meet Tiago PZK
articles.description: Tiago PZK forms part of the new wave of Argentina artists, placing many songs on the Billboard global charts. Meet October's Latin Artist on the Rise.
articles.content:
Tiago PZK was six years old when he discovered his love for music, crediting Daddy Yankee and his 2007 “Impacto (Remix)” featuring Fergie for truly igniting his desire to pursue it as a career.

articles.description: Oct 13 (Reuters) - Following are selected highlights from a report issued by the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Foreign Agricultural Service post in Buenos Aires:"Post lowers its MY 2021/22 projected planted area for soybeans to 17.0 million hectares. articles.title: Azor review - eerie conspiracy thriller about the complacency of the super-rich
articles.description: Andreas Fontana’s debut feature is an unnervingly subtle drama about a Swiss private banker visiting clients in Argentina during the period of the military junta and ‘disappearances’
articles.content: Pure evil is all around in this unnervingly subtle, sophisticated movie; an eerie oppression in the air. Andreas Fontana is a Swiss director making his feature debut with this conspiracy drama-thriller, shot with a kind of desiccated blankness, about... [4071 chars]
